favourite.article: As a french speaker this hymn is so profound. It. helps us. The Holy Spirit is praying in our weakness so God can gain more of us in every tribulation. Everything is according to His plan. I love You Lord. Let me say amen to all of you.

Heirs of God! Joint-heirs with our Lord Jesus! What a hope of glory this for us! What an encouraging hymn! Thank you Lord for every situation, may we see Your sovereing hand!!! Yea, in all these things we more than conquer,Through the One whose love has us possessed. May we press on and continue to enjoy your grace for the sake of the building up of the Church!!

Amen! Everything is according to His plan and every trial is but the Father's prayer! Lord do gain us day by day! Make us willing to be broken and manifest Your glorious treasure within us earthen vessels!

"O Lord Jesus this hymn is my prayer to You!" Enjoyed this hymn very much and was not only comforted but also strengthened by The Lord to press on! What a wonderful hope of glory we have in Him as promised in His word! Being reminded of this in the midst of sufferings is such an encouragement to keep looking away unto the Author and Perfecter of our faith.
Thank You Lord,Your words full promise that strengthen us day by day. Deepen our experience of You, so that we might see the beauty of Thy grace. I love You Lord.
Beautiful tune and words--I can't find the lyric's author's name. .
I found this song accidentally, but I think, God really intended me to find this one. I am comforted and touched!
